item.title: About Decision Trees
item.author: santos.tmd@gmail.com (Tiago dos Santos)
item.description: Understanding Decision Trees A Decision tree is a modal that can â€¦ Splitting the dataset: Entropy The essence of a decision tree is the process of splitting the data into subsets to arrange the leafs as pure nodes - or almost pure nodes. In a real world scenario, we must assume that it is not possible to have all leafs as pure node because there are problems that are that difficult to solve.
